title: God of War: Ragnarok
review: Game of the Year! Visually stunning and very fun. The story is very captivating and keeps me invested.

title: Overwatch 2
review: Not much has changed from the first game. The new characters are fun but some are unbalanced and make winning against them a challenge.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
review: One of the better Call of Duty games in recent memory. Does a good job of bringing back the feeling of the original Modern Warfare II.

title: Valorant
review: Riot Games' take on a tactical shooter does a good job at making the genre feel fresh. There are some balancing issues but overall the game is mostly fun.
